headline: J.B. Hunt price target raised to $172 from $147 at Stifel
summary: Stifel analyst J. Bruce Chan raised the firm’s price target on J.B. Hunt (JBHT) to $172 from $147 and keeps a Hold rating on the shares. For 2026, the firm believes the focus for transport stocks will be on supply rationalization and cost-driven self-help, says the analyst, who continues to position “more conservatively in high-quality names that preserve or even expand share in a mild pullback.”Claim 50% Off TipRanks Premium and Invest with Confidence Unlock hedge-fund level data and powerful i
